replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 驱动问题，百度更新驱动

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.IllegalStateException: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL复制代码

你的驱动程序不支持 OpenGL，那当然就没法启动游戏。
建议更新驱动，或者升级电脑硬件配置，或者换台电脑。
